title: Luxury Yacht
body:
This boat offers a variety of fun, scenic and romantic cruises providing the perfect experience for everyone, including sunset, coastal, party cruises, whale watching cruises, corporate events and private charters.

**Private Charters:**

* Captain Jack's Tours offers private Santa Barbara boat charters. Private charters for a gorgeous special event your guests wonâ€™t forget. Our unique features are perfect for weddings, business events, parties, memorials and more!
* 46 passenger capacity
* Multi level yacht
* Dance floor
* Full bar
* Views from everywhere on the yacht
* Cruise director with every charter
* Catering and event planning available
* 2 hour minimum required for a chartered event ($1000 per hour plus 12% port fee & 18% gratuity)
